mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_table (user_idx, p_name, p_type, p_brand, p_volume, p_price, p_saleprice, buy_rate, total_quatity, regdate) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{p_name},#{p_type},#{p_brand},#{p_volume},#{p_price},#{p_saleprice},0,#{total_quatity},sysdate())
